references.paper_title: Local Privacy and Statistical Minimax Rates
references.reason: This paper establishes the minimax framework for analyzing privacy-utility tradeoffs in the context of local differential privacy, providing a benchmark for optimal mechanisms.

references.paper_title: Optimal Schemes for Discrete Distribution Estimation Under Locally Differential Privacy
references.reason: This paper provides optimal mechanisms for discrete distribution estimation under LDP, serving as a direct comparison for the current work's focus on sampling.
This is the most directly related work, introducing the problem of private sampling under LDP, which the current paper aims to improve and generalize.

references.paper_title: Extremal Mechanisms for Local Differential Privacy
references.reason: This paper provides a fundamental understanding of extremal mechanisms under local differential privacy, which the current paper builds upon to achieve optimality.
